metadata.title: CVE-2016-10245 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient sanitization of the query parameter intemplates/html/search_opensearch.php could lead to reflected cross-sitescripting or iframe injection.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

doxygen - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-doxyparse - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-gui - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
doxygen-latex - 1.8.13-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: doxygen package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.13-10ubuntu1').
quantlib-refman-html package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
